uk.org.taverna.scufl2.api.io
Class WorkflowBundleIO

java.lang.Object
  uk.org.taverna.scufl2.api.io.WorkflowBundleIO

public class WorkflowBundleIO
extends java.lang.Object

Utility class for reading and writing WorkflowBundles.

getReaderForMediaType

public WorkflowBundleReader getReaderForMediaType(java.lang.String mediaType)
Returns a WorkflowBundleReader for the specified media type. If there is more than one WorkflowBundleReader for the specified media type the first reader discovered is returned. Subsequent calls to this method may return a different reader. If there is no WorkflowBundleReader for the specified media type null is returned.

Parameters:
mediaType - the media type of the WorkflowBundleReader
Returns:
a WorkflowBundleReader for the specified media type

getReaders

public java.util.List<WorkflowBundleReader> getReaders()
Returns all the available WorkflowBundleReaders.

Returns:
all the available WorkflowBundleReaders

getWriterForMediaType

public WorkflowBundleWriter getWriterForMediaType(java.lang.String mediaType)
Returns a WorkflowBundleWriter for the specified media type. If there is more than one WorkflowBundleWriter for the specified media type the first writer discovered is returned. Subsequent calls to this method may return a different writer. If there is no WorkflowBundleWriter for the specified media type null is returned.

Parameters:
mediaType - the media type of the WorkflowBundleWriter
Returns:
a WorkflowBundleWriter for the specified media type

getWriters

public java.util.List<WorkflowBundleWriter> getWriters()
Returns all the available WorkflowBundleWriters.

Returns:
all the available WorkflowBundleWriters

guessMediaTypeForSignature

public java.lang.String guessMediaTypeForSignature(byte[] firstBytes)
Attempt to guess the media type for a stream or file that starts with these bytes.

All registered getReaders() are consulted.

Return null if ambiguous (more than one possibility) or unknown.

Parameters:
firstBytes - The initial bytes, at least 512 bytes long unless the resource is smaller.
Returns:
The recognised media type, or null if the bytes were ambiguous or unknown.

readBundle

public WorkflowBundle readBundle(java.io.File bundleFile,
                                 java.lang.String mediaType)
                          throws ReaderException,
                                 java.io.IOException
Reads a file containing a workflow bundle in the specified media type and returns a WorkflowBundle.

Parameters:
bundleFile - the file containing the workflow bundle
mediaType - the media type of the workflow bundle. A WorkflowBundleReader must exist for this media type. If null, the media type will be guessed as with guessMediaTypeForSignature(byte[]).
Returns:
the WorkflowBundle read from the file
Throws:
ReaderException - if there is an error parsing the workflow bundle
java.io.IOException - if there is an error reading the file
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if a WorkflowBundleReader cannot be found for the media type

readBundle

public WorkflowBundle readBundle(java.io.InputStream inputStream,
                                 java.lang.String mediaType)
                          throws ReaderException,
                                 java.io.IOException
Reads a stream containing a workflow bundle in the specified media type and returns a WorkflowBundle.

Parameters:
inputStream - the stream containing the workflow bundle
mediaType - the media type of the workflow bundle. A WorkflowBundleReader must exist for this media type. If null, the media type will be guessed as with guessMediaTypeForSignature(byte[]).
Returns:
the WorkflowBundle read from the stream
Throws:
ReaderException - if there is an error parsing the workflow bundle
java.io.IOException - if there is an error reading from the stream
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if a WorkflowBundleReader cannot be found for the media type

                                 java.lang.String mediaType)
                          throws ReaderException,
                                 java.io.IOException
Reads a URL containing a workflow bundle in the specified media type and returns a WorkflowBundle.

Parameters:

Returns:
the WorkflowBundle read from the URL
Throws:

java.io.IOException - if there is an error reading from the stream

This method will normally be called by Spring when wiring beans.

writeBundle

public void writeBundle(WorkflowBundle wfBundle,
                        java.io.File destination,
                        java.lang.String mediaType)
                 throws WriterException,
                        java.io.IOException
Writes a WorkflowBundle to a file with specified media type.

Parameters:
wfBundle - the workflow bundle to write
destination - the file to write the workflow bundle to
mediaType - the media type to write workflow bundle in. A WorkflowBundleWriter must exist for this media type
Throws:
WriterException - if there is an error writing the workflow bundle
java.io.IOException - if there is an error writing the file
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if a WorkflowBundleWriter cannot be found for the media type

writeBundle

public void writeBundle(WorkflowBundle wfBundle,
                        java.io.OutputStream output,
                        java.lang.String mediaType)
                 throws WriterException,
                        java.io.IOException
Writes a WorkflowBundle to a stream with specified media type.

Parameters:
wfBundle - the workflow bundle to write
output - the stream to write the workflow bundle to
mediaType - the media type to write workflow bundle in. A WorkflowBundleWriter must exist for this media type
Throws:
WriterException - if there is an error writing the workflow bundle
java.io.IOException - if there is an error writing to the stream
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if a WorkflowBundleWriter cannot be found for the media type
